original_text: And call ye on the name of your gods, and I will call on the name of the Lord: and the God that answereth by fire, let him be God. And all the people answered and said, It is well spoken.
korean_text: 너희는 너희 신의 이름을 부르라 나는 여호와의 이름을 부르리니 이에 불로 응답하는 신 그가 하나님이니라 백성이 다 대답하되 그 말이 옳도다 하니라

sentences.original_text: And call ye on the name of your gods
and I will call on the name of the Lord
and the God that answereth by fire
And all the people answered and said
